Model: WR-20-11 Categories: Restaurant Equipment » Hotel Restaurant Equipment » Description: Specification Size(L*W*H) : 910*820*1880mm Capacity : 20 layers Inner size (L/H/D): 440*1488*650mm Height (per tray): 60mm Power: 37kw Voltage : 3N-380V Net Weight: 350KG Features Stainless steel Round corners inside the chamber,sanitary and easy cleaning Heavy duty heating element,can be heating up fastly Four modes,can be shifted simply Food probe,can supervise and control the temperature of interior food Can store 50 menu,easy to select,and can be edited at any time Thermostat control function Humidity eliminating function to ensure the baking effect Integral boiler,automatically steam generated Auto-cleaning function
Note 1. MOQ : 1 set 2. Place of origin : Guangdong China (Mainland) 3. Payment term : T/T , Western Union , L/C 4. Package : Carton ,Wooden case 5. Port of loading : Guangzhou or Shenzhen 6. Shipment : By Sea, By Air, or via DHL, UPS ,TNT,FEDEX,EMS etc.( We'll consider the best way for saving shipment cost ) 7. Shipment date : 15 days after receiving the deposit 8. Warranty period : 1 year 9. Customer service : Lifelong technoly support and accessories supply.
